metadata.name: I'm Darth Vader!
metadata.description:
I'm Darth Vader!

This is my new digital art project "Magic Wheelchair" where my artistic vision takes me to magical worlds and builds epic cgi costumes for our kid hero in his wheelchair!

Truly Wonderful, the Mind of a Child Is

Master Yoda -
Softwares: 3ds Max 2020, ZBrush 4, AE, RedShift render.

All my love and respect to all wheelchair users in the world.
Ant√≥nio Peres 3D.
